31
32/* Number of extractions used to warm the buffer up. */
33#define WARM_UP 2000
34
35/* Period parameters. */
36#define N 624
37#define M 397
38#define MATRIX_A 0x9908B0DF /* Constant vector a. */
39
40/* State structure for MT. */
41typedef struct
42{
43 gmp_uint_least32_t mt[N]; /* State array. */
44 int mti; /* Index of current value. */
45} gmp_rand_mt_struct;
46
47
48void __gmp_mt_recalc_buffer (gmp_uint_least32_t *);
49void __gmp_randget_mt (gmp_randstate_t, mp_ptr, unsigned long int);
50void __gmp_randclear_mt (gmp_randstate_t);
51void __gmp_randiset_mt (gmp_randstate_ptr, gmp_randstate_srcptr);
52
